This project will impact in general to the graduate students and local community of around university. Previous period, REC has contribute a lot to it beneficiaries mentioned above, by providing training and technical support to them. Observation shown that, the first implementation of project plan had good results to the stakeholders, by them still having some challenging of moving forward.
This time REC, is planning to enough approach to its beneficiaries, 2015 will be a year of promoting business environment, where all beneficiaries will gain enough support in order to grow their existing businesses. By reference of research conducted by REC last year into the beneficiaries, the results shown that, they have lack of skills of managing their business, and what are the ways for passing for growing the business. In this perspective, this lack of confidence of making successfully business REC is committed to resolve or react in 2015 by providing Business Grow Competition (BGP), this competition, will be organized in the manner of where the best winners will be awarded as sign of motivation. Within of RTUC students and Alumni, presently REC count around 40 students having running businesses, and they need technical support by getting loan from the bank so that this project is there for supporting them in this process. Our beneficiaries need also to arrange their business plan knowledgeable in order to submit them into the bank.
